member.name: TAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS
member.summary: TheTAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS structure describes the tape drive. It is used by the function.

member.name: TAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS.ECC
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, hardware error correction is supported. Otherwise, it is not.

member.name: TAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS.Compression
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, hardware data compression is enabled. Otherwise, it is disabled.

member.name: TAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS.DataPadding
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, data padding is enabled. Otherwise, it is disabled. Data padding keeps the tape streaming at a constant speed.

member.name: TAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS.ReportSetmarks
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, setmark reporting is enabled. Otherwise, it is disabled.

member.name: TAPE_SET_DRIVE_PARAMETERS.EOTWarningZoneSize
member.summary: Number of bytes between the end-of-tape warning and the physical end of the tape.
